exercises.title: Verb Conjugation - To See
exercises.instructions: Conjugate the verb 'to see' (ხედვა) for each subject.

questions.question: შენ _____ წიგნს (You see the book)
questions.explanation: შენ (you) uses base form without prefix: ხედავ (khedav)

exercises.title: Build SVO Sentences
exercises.instructions: Complete each sentence with the correct verb and case form.

questions.question: მე _____ წიგნს (I read the book)
questions.explanation: Use 'to read' with I: ვკითხულობ (vkit'khulob). Object წიგნს is in Dative case.

questions.question: ბავშვი _____ წიგნს (The child reads the book)

exercises.title: Case Agreement
exercises.instructions: Choose the correct case for the object in each sentence.

questions.question: In 'მე ვხედავ კატას', what case is კატას?
questions.explanation: Objects of verbs take Dative case. კატას is Dative (from კატა + -ს).
